T02TD1634E:252b-1: m'a h'a m'a y'a s'a dha nam /
T02TD1634E:252b-4: dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1634E:252b-5: sgyu ma chen mo rnam sgeg pas //
T02TD1634E:252b-6: sna tshogs sgyu ma bzhad gad ltar //
T02TD1634E:252b-7: thugs rje'i stobs can dga' ba can //
T02TD1634E:252b-8: sgyu mas rnam rgyal phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1634E:252b-9: sdug bsngal gsum gdungs bdag nyid khams gsum pa /
T02TD1634E:253a-0: @253a * // gang las byung ba'i bde ba chen po yod //
T02TD1634E:253a-1: thugs rje chen po'i rig pa rtog chen po'i //
T02TD1634E:253a-2: de nyid rnam brgyan bla ma bzang la 'dud //
T02TD1634E:253a-3: sgyu ma chen mo'i rjes 'brangs nas //
T02TD1634E:253a-4: snying rje'i stobs can rdo rje yi //
T02TD1634E:253a-5: gang zhig bsgrub par 'dod pa yis //
T02TD1634E:253a-6: bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di brtsams so //
T02TD1634E:253a-7: snying ga'i nang du zla ba la //
T02TD1634E:253a-8: zla dkyil rang gi sa bon bsam //
T02TD1634E:253a-9: de yi 'od kyis lus reg pas //
T02TD1634E:253a-10: lus kyi dran pa nyer gzhag pa //
T02TD1634E:253a-11: de gyur pa las lus rnams dang //
T02TD1634E:253a-12: 'jig rten srid pa snang ba la //
T02TD1634E:253a-13: mdun na lha dang sangs rgyas rnams //
T02TD1634E:253a-14: gus pas ma lus mchod par bya'o //
T02TD1634E:253a-15: dkon mchog gsum la sogs pa yi //
T02TD1634E:253a-16: tshigs bcad gsum ni bsgrag par bya //
T02TD1634E:253a-17: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgom byas la //
T02TD1634E:253a-18: stong pa nyid ni bsgom byas nas //
T02TD1634E:253a-19: gsang sngags kyang ni brjod par bya //
T02TD1634E:253a-20: bsrung ba'i sngags kyang dran byas la //
T02TD1634E:253a-21: rdo rje ra sogs rnam par bsam //
T02TD1634E:253a-22: chos kyi dbyings su chud pa yi //
T02TD1634E:253a-23: de nang 'byung ba bsam par bya //
T02TD1634E:253a-24: steng du ri rab bsgom byas te //
T02TD1634E:253a-25: 'byung ba'i ri rab gyur pa las //
T02TD1634E:253a-26: gzhal yas khang pa bsam byas te //
T02TD1634E:253a-27: zur bzhi dang ni ldan pas gnas //
T02TD1634E:253a-28: rgyud rnams kun nas 'byung ba bzhin//
T02TD1634E:253a-29: phyi yi phyogs dang mtshams rnams su //
T02TD1634E:253a-30: dur khrod kyis ni rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1634E:253a-31: de yi ming dang mtshan nyid ni //
T02TD1634E:253a-32: ji bzhin lung gis bshad par bya //
T02TD1634E:253a-33: gtum drag gcig ste dbyibs can ni //
T02TD1634E:253a-34: gnyis pa tshang tshing gsum pa yin //
T02TD1634E:253a-35: 'bar ba zhes bya bzhi pa yin //
T02TD1634E:253a-36: mi thod ces bya lnga pa yin ;
T02TD1634E:253a-37: / mi bzad pa dang ha har dgod //
T02TD1634E:253a-38: brgyad pa g-yeng ka can du 'dod //
T02TD1634E:253a-39: dang po tshig pa zhes bya ste //
T02TD1634E:253a-40: gnyis pa yang ni ma tshig pa //
T02TD1634E:253a-41: gsum pa dum bur gyur pa ste //
T02TD1634E:253a-42: bzhi pa dum bur ma gyur pa //
T02TD1634E:253a-43: lnga pa 'jigs pa zhes bshad de //
T02TD1634E:253a-44: drug pa 'jigs par byed pa yin//
T02TD1634E:253a-45: bdun pa mdung rtse bskyon pa ste //
T02TD1634E:253a-46: brkyang pa sgeg pa zhes bya'o //
T02TD1634E:253a-47: khra dang ce sbyang 'ug pa dang //
T02TD1634E:253a-48: gtum po'i khyi dang srin po phag / ro langs khro ba dregs khro ma //
T02TD1634E:253a-49: brgyad kyis gtso bo yang dag bskor //
T02TD1634E:253a-50: gzhal yas khang pa'i dbus su ni //
T02TD1634E:253a-51: padma dmar po bsam bya ste //
T02TD1634E:253b-0: de yi dbus @253b su zla ba yi //
T02TD1634E:253b-2: de yi dbus su sa bon ni //
T02TD1634E:253b-3: rnam pa lnga ni rim bsgoms pas //
T02TD1634E:253b-4: de las spros dang bsdu ba dag / byas nas snying rje'i stobs chen sogs //
T02TD1634E:253b-5: sa bon lnga las bdag nyid lnga //
T02TD1634E:253b-6: ye shes lnga ldan khyab bdag nyid //
T02TD1634E:253b-7: zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1634E:253b-8: spyan gsum sku mdog nag po ljang //
T02TD1634E:253b-9: skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs //
T02TD1634E:253b-10: lha mo'i tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan //
T02TD1634E:253b-11: phyag rgya drug dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1634E:253b-12: yan lag thal pa'i rdul gyis byug / dum bu'i rgyan gyi ska rags can //
T02TD1634E:253b-13: thod rlon phreng bas brgyan pa ste //
T02TD1634E:253b-14: sngo dang ser dang dkar dang ljang //
T02TD1634E:253b-15: zhal bzhi po dang ldan pa la //
T02TD1634E:253b-16: thod pa kha tva'm 'chang ba dang //
T02TD1634E:253b-17: de bzhin mda' dang gzhu 'dzin pa //
T02TD1634E:253b-18: lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa yi //
T02TD1634E:253b-19: sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan //
T02TD1634E:253b-20: zhal bzhi'i mdog can lha mo bzhi //
T02TD1634E:253b-21: 'dab ma bzhi la rnam par bsam//
T02TD1634E:253b-22: zhal bzhi pa la phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1634E:253b-23: spyan gsum gtso bo'i zhal dang mtshungs //
T02TD1634E:253b-24: shar gyi zhal ni thams cad kyang //
T02TD1634E:253b-25: rigs kyi gtso bo dang mthun pa //
T02TD1634E:253b-26: g-yon pa dril du kha tv'am ga / slar yang lha mo g-yas pa la //
T02TD1634E:253b-27: rdo rje dang ni thod pa bsnams //
T02TD1634E:253b-28: gnyis pa lho yi 'dab ma la //
T02TD1634E:253b-29: ser mo zhal gyi kha dog ni //
T02TD1634E:253b-30: ser dang sngo dang dkar dang ljang //
T02TD1634E:253b-31: kha dog ldan pas rnam par bzhugs //
T02TD1634E:253b-32: phyag ni g-yon pa steng dag na //
T02TD1634E:253b-33: thod dang ce spyang bsnams pa ste //
T02TD1634E:253b-34: g-yas na rin chen mdung dag dang //
T02TD1634E:253b-35: chu khams rin chen mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1634E:253b-36: gsum pa nub kyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD1634E:253b-37: me yi khams kyi rang bzhin can //
T02TD1634E:253b-38: dkar dmar mdangs kyi 'od gsal ba //
T02TD1634E:253b-40: dkar dang sngo dang shin tu ser //
T02TD1634E:253b-41: ljang gu'i mdog ste zhal bzhi pa //
T02TD1634E:253b-42: sna tshogs padma mda' dang bcas //
T02TD1634E:253b-43: g-yon ba thod pa gzhu 'dzin ma'o //
T02TD1634E:253b-44: byang gi phyogs kyi 'dab ma la //
T02TD1634E:253b-46: ljang sngon de bzhin ser po dang //
T02TD1634E:253b-47: dkar po'i zhal can phyag bzhi pa //
T02TD1634E:253b-48: ral gri dang ni cang te'u dag / g-yas na rtag tu 'dzin pa dang //
T02TD1634E:253b-49: g-yon na thod pa zhags pa bsnams //
T02TD1634E:253b-50: rlung gi khams kye mkha' 'gro ma //
T02TD1634E:253b-51: de ltar rnam par bsgom par bya //
T02TD1634E:254a-1: rang sa bon gang yin dgod //
T02TD1634E:254a-2: sngags kyis skur ni bsgom byas la //
T02TD1634E:254a-3: ye shes dkyil 'khor chen po ni //
T02TD1634E:254a-4: dbang bskur chen po bsam par bya //
T02TD1634E:254a-5: gtso bo'i dbul mi bskyod pa //
T02TD1634E:254a-6: mchod cing bstod la bdud rtsi myang //
T02TD1634E:254a-7: byas nas bzlas dang brtul zhugs spyad //
T02TD1634E:254a-8: sgra med bzlas pa bya ba dang //
T02TD1634E:254a-9: hra'i: yi yi ge bzlas pa'i gzugs //
T02TD1634E:254a-10: aam sogs rnal 'byor ma sogs la //
T02TD1634E:254a-11: dbugs rngub pa yis rgyun du ni //
T02TD1634E:254a-12: brgyad pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1634E:254a-13: drug pa dang ni thig ler bcas //
T02TD1634E:254a-14: dbugs dbyung ba yang rnal 'byor pas //
T02TD1634E:254a-15: bsgom dang bsgom min rnam par spang //
T02TD1634E:254a-16: sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag nyid //
T02TD1634E:254a-18: gzhan yang rdo rje bzlas pa dang //
T02TD1634E:254a-19: bzlas dang rdo rje 'chang ba bsgom //
T02TD1634E:254a-20: bzlas pa gnyis pa byas nas ni //
T02TD1634E:254a-21: grangs med mnyam par gzhag pa yis //
T02TD1634E:254a-22: mthar yang yi ge gsum gyis ni //
T02TD1634E:254a-23: brgyad pa'i mtha' las rnam par gnas //
T02TD1634E:254a-24: au yi yi ge thung ngur bcas //
T02TD1634E:254a-25: yi ge mchog ni dam pa ste //
T02TD1634E:254a-26: aa sogs yi ge rnal 'byor ma //
T02TD1634E:254a-27: hr'i: yi yi ger yang dag sbyor //
T02TD1634E:254a-28: aa yi mtha' dang yang dag ldan //
T02TD1634E:254a-29: sa bon lnga yis dgos par bcas //
T02TD1634E:254a-30: padma kha bye byas nas ni //
T02TD1634E:254a-31: yi ge rnams ni bsgom par bya //
T02TD1634E:254a-32: de ltar rnal 'byor rtog byas nas //
T02TD1634E:254a-33: 'dod pa'i don grub rdo rje can //
T02TD1634E:254a-34: sngags kyis byin brlabs de nas ni //
T02TD1634E:254a-35: rnal 'byor chen po de mnyam gzhag / rang bzhin shes rab yan lag gi //
T02TD1634E:254a-36: gsang ba'i ze'u 'bru'i spyod yul du //
T02TD1634E:254a-37: lte bar gnas pa'i ri mo la //
T02TD1634E:254a-38: de la gnas par sbyar bar bya //
T02TD1634E:254a-39: a'a le k'a li mnyam byas nas //
T02TD1634E:254a-40: 'bar ba la sogs sngags pa yi //
T02TD1634E:254a-41: seng ge'i rnal 'byor phyag rgya ni //
T02TD1634E:254a-42: bcings te gtum mo gzhug par bya //
T02TD1634E:254a-43: gzugs med lha yi rnal 'byor byas //
T02TD1634E:254a-44: rtog pas yang dag bsgyur nas ni //
T02TD1634E:254a-45: brgyad pa'i mthar ni thig ler bcas //
T02TD1634E:254a-47: lan gnyis lan gsum goms byas te //
T02TD1634E:254a-48: bde ba chen po 'dzag pa na //
T02TD1634E:254a-50: gzhan yang rnal 'byor la bos nas //
T02TD1634E:254a-51: rnal 'byor ma yis slong bar byed //
T02TD1634E:254a-52: kye ma mnyam mchog rdo rje yi //
T02TD1634E:254a-53: 'od kyi padma kha bye zhig / aa la la la la ha //
T02TD1634E:254b-0: bde ba chen po @254b rab tu dgyes pa'i gar mdzod cig / nyi ma'i 'od kyis padma kha rab 'byed pa bzhin //
T02TD1634E:254b-1: bde ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i gar mdzod cig / de ltar thugs ni dgyes gyur nas //
T02TD1634E:254b-2: sgeg pa chen po rnam par bsgyings //
T02TD1634E:254b-3: lha mo'i tshogs kyi dbus na ni //
T02TD1634E:254b-4: dgyes pa'i dga' bas rnam par rol //
T02TD1634E:254b-5: bdag gis sgrub thabs 'di byas pa'i //
T02TD1634E:254b-7: sgyu 'phrul chen mo khyab bdag gi / gtso bo'i bdag nyid thob par shog / slob dpon chen po dpal rin chen rdo rje'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so /
T02TD1634E:254b-9: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po mkhas pa chen po dzny'a na shr'i bha dra dang /
T02TD1634E:254b-10: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong 'phags pa shes rab kyis bsgyur ba'o//
